page.title: 07Pimperne Clubs.
page.content: Pimperne Gardening Club was formed in 1970.Originally it had 27 members but now it has over 80.Not only does it hold talks,discussions and competitions about gardening but it has extended its activities to include rambles,barbecues and theatre trips. Pimperne Piscatorials were started in 1977.It was very popular and arranged deep sea and fresh water fishing.Later a young peoples' and a ladies' section were formed.At present members seem most interested in fresh water fishing.Pimperne First School Parents' Association formed in 1966.Educational meetings,discussions,social events are always very well supported and the Association has provided a swimming pool,a computer,a video recorder and many other things.For young people there is a Brownie Pack and a Junior and Senior Youth Club.
